title: ???? NOW HIRING: Credit Repair Dispute Specialist (Remote)
job_overview:
???? NOW HIRING: Credit Repair Dispute Specialist (Remote)
Do you know how to remove negative items using real consumer laws — not templates? Are you confident in your ability to file CFPB and BBB complaints, handle TransUnion sweeps, and use advanced techniques like data breach disputes backed by FCRA and UCC law?

If you're serious about credit repair and ready to grow with a real company that gets real results, we want you on the team.

???? Position: Credit Repair Dispute Specialist
Type: Remote (Part-Time)
Pay: Starts at $350/month, paid weekly at $100/week
Increase to $440/month after 90 days based on performance
Payout Method: Remitly or GCash (paid every Wednesday)

? What You’ll Be Responsible For:
Disputing negative accounts directly through Experian, TransUnion, and Equifax

Filing CFPB and BBB complaints for accounts that are verified or ignored

Using advanced legal-based methods to challenge:

Late payments

Collections

Charge-offs

Reinserted accounts (flag for Janaye directly — do not act independently)

Identity theft or data breach accounts

TransUnion sweep strategies

Logging all dispute activity and client updates in DisputeFox CRM

???? You MUST Be Familiar With:
FCRA (Fair Credit Reporting Act)

FDCPA (Fair Debt Collection Practices Act)

UCC (Uniform Commercial Code)

Truth In Lending Act (TILA)

Laws like:

FCRA 611(a)(5)(B) – Reinsertions

FCRA 605B / 1681c-2 – Data breach removal

FCRA 607(b), 623(a)(1), 1681i – Accuracy disputes & reinvestigation

DisputeFox CRM (must be comfortable navigating and updating inside the platform)

???? Ideal Candidate:
Aggressive and results-driven

Legally sharp and detail-oriented

Can manage multiple disputes across clients

Self-motivated with consistent follow-through

Wants long-term remote work with room for growth

Doesn’t need to onboard clients — just handle the disputes once they’re in

???? TO APPLY:
Message me with the following:

Your full name and country

A sample of a past dispute (portal language, letter, or complaint)

Brief summary of your experience with law-based disputes and CFPB/BBB complaints

Why you’re looking for long-term remote work in credit repair
ANY PAST CLIENT RESULTS 

We don’t do fluff work. We remove accounts the legal way and we get results. If that’s how you work too, let’s grow together. ????????
Janaye ParkerUpgrade to see actual infoUpgrade to see actual info
